Utterance: Toh Bethany, tumi amake bolte paro ei saptah ta tomar jonno kemon chilo?

Ei saptah? Um, jani na. Mone hoi ektu beshi productive chilo than usual. Kintu asolei na, ami still just usual, dead to the world. Tumi jano, tumi jano, ami just amar ghore beshi somoy katai, ami asolei part noi world er ba amar family er. Ami just nijer ekta choto sad universe e bandho.
Mane tumi feel korcho isolated tumar family theke?
Ha, just really disconnected feel korchi. Just really, jani na. Eta just khub tough week chilo amar husband er sathe. Amra onek jhogra korechi as usual.
Jokhon tumi bolo disconnected feel korchho, tumi ki ektu beshi explain korte parbe eta ki rokom dekhte?

Ha, mone hoi. Ami just, ami eto tired sara din ar just exhausted ar or kache onek demands ache ar onek kichu ache je or mone hoi ami korar jonno. Ar ami just feel kori ami capable noi eta korar. Ami toh nijer theke bed thekeo uthte pari na sakal bela. Nijer theke supposed to do all the things or mone hoi ami korar jonno. Just gat raat, bari fire eshe amake jemon usual yelling koreche ar sob dishes sink e chilo ar sob laundry bed er upore chilo. Like, ami or ke bolte pari ni je ami online e job khujechi, je ami mone kori proud hote parbo je ami try korechi ar na, ami job pai ni. So whatever It's that big of a deal. Ami just vabchilam maybe like amra eta niye kotha bolte pari. Kintu eta just feeling niye shirts hote pare ironed ar ami kichu korte pari ni.
So tumi feel korcho je jodi tumi kichu progress kore thako job khujte ei saptah e, tumi much accomplishment feel koro ni eta theke karon tumar husband eta acknowledge kore ni ba appreciate kore ni.
Ha, or kichui appreciate kore na.
Not appreciated howar jonno tumi bhitore kemon feel koro?

Just amar sara body ache kore just amake empty feel kore. Like, jodi or kache appreciate na kora hoy je ami kichu kori, tahole ami keno motivated hobo je or mone hoi ami korar jonno? Like, ami kivabe shirts iron korbo jokhon ami sakal bela bed thekeo uthte pari na? Tumi jano It just amake really just just empty, just miserable feel kore.

Ami shunte pachi tumi bolcho je tumi shutting down korchho. Ar ami shudhu shuntei pachi na, ami dekhte pachi tumi ekhane amar sathe boshe. Jemon tumi boshecho tomar arms crossed niye, ami feel kori tumi nijer ke close off korcho onek kichu theke, onek manush theke.

Ha, definitely karon tara kichui notice kore na je ami kichu kori. Ar mone hoi Monday te ami actually bari theke beriye chilam je ami mone kori chilo ekta boro deal oi moment e. Kintu ami cat ke groomer e niye giyechi, amar husband months dhore bollen je eta korar jonno, ar jani na, ami bari theke beriye groomer e giyechi ami pajamas change korechi ar ei sob kichu amar kache boro deal chilo, kintu or kache eta kono accomplishment mone hoi ni. Tarpor even notice kore ni, amar meye o notice kore ni. Se just bari fire eshe door slam kore ar amake ekbar o dekhe ni. Cat groomed hoye nice little bow niye chilo. Eta holo pach din age korechilam, tarpor theke kichu kori ni. Tai ami feel kori. Ami feel kori ami ekta huge accomplishment korechi nijer jonno bari theke beriye. Even cat ke groomer e niye giyechi kintu tarpor bari fire eshe karo kache notice na peye, eta sob kichu niye jay. Eta amar kache ar matter kore na.
Exactly.

So jate kichu matter kore amar kache, ar ami feel kori even little progress steps ami nijer kache korechi, ami really need kori eta acknowledge kora hok amar husband er dike theke. Ha. I mean, otherwise, ki point? Tumi jano, jodi support na thake, tara shudhu point out kore je ami kichu kori ni, tara kichu kore but it's all about je kichu kora hoi ni. Oh, tumi vacuum koro ni dui mas, kintu tara notice kore na je kichu.

Tai ami shunte pachi tumi experience korchho onek hurt. Eta khub kharap jinish. Tumi feel korchho all the skirt. Tumi feel korchho upay recognize kora jachche na ke tumi. Tumi all this laundry. vacuum korte hobe, chores korte hobe. Tai ki korte hobe wave comedian. Eta ke ekta jaygay rekhe dite hobe ekto somoyer jonno jate sob issues address kora jay. Tumi try korte paro eta ke ekta jar e rekhe dite, ar amra oi jar ke bolbo trick jar.
Eta kothin. Eta amar jonno disconnect. Ami just separate korte pari na nijer theke.
Thik ache. Tumi ki mone koro je eta hurt bolte chay?
Jani na.
Cholo ek minute niye vabte pari.
Hote pare eta just bolte chay je eta ami sobsomoy kori. Ami sobsomoy try kori avoid korte.
Eta seller hurt, kintu hote pare hurt ta important. Amra eta ke push away korte parbo ekbar, so eta sobsomoy thakbe na. Tai jodi amra eta kori,
Mone hoi ami try korte pari. Na, eta, eta bolte chay je eta kaj korbe na. Eta just, eta just je ami sobsomoy kori diye. Ami just try kori avoid korte.

Cholo try kori eta korte. Tumi try koro tomar chokh bondho korte. Tumi ekhane breathing exercises koro, ekta deep breath in, deep breath out, deep breath in, deep breath out imagine koro sob laundry, husband, daughter, eta sob put koro baire hallway te, khub quiet. Eta kemon feel kore?
Ektu beshi relaxed.
Ar ki ache hallway te?
Just different kichu.
Tumi ekhon ki feel korcho?
Ektu relaxed.
Kintu ami ajke kono agenda niye asini. Tai jekono kichu mone ashe ba mone hoi guruttopurno, amra ek minute niye vabte pari. Chokh bondho kore vabo tumi ki feel korcho. Toh tumi ekhon ki feel korcho?
Ami guess kori eta actually ki. Ami guilty feel kori, even letting go je hurt ta ami need kori. Hurt ta ami guilty feel kori. Ami uchit noi eto kharap feel korte even hurting er jonno.
Mane, tumi guilty feel korchho je tumi not worthy of feeling hurt, not worthy?
Ami guilty feel kori even feeling hurt er jonno, kintu ami guilty feel kori je ami deserve kori na happiness, kintu ami jani ami probably deserve kori feel better.
Tai ami chaichi ektu dive into korte, eta little bit, je arise korchhe wanting to try something new er moddhe.
Ha, guess kori.

Tai, ami chaichi tumi ei chair ta niye vabte. Ami chaichi tumi picture koro nijer ke, eta holo tumar side je bolen tumi deserve koro feel korte ar tumi deserve koro na nijer upor focus korte. Nijeke bolo kivabe eta tumake guilty feel korte dey.

Ami just feel kori ami guilty karon ami hurt kori karon eta amake force kore just bed e thakte ar eta amake hurt kore feel kori ami incapable ami family ke care korte ar ami need kori family ke care korte. Ar ami just guilty feel kori karon ami seta korte pari na.
Prothome deserve kori ami deserve kori beshi, tumi deserve koro na feel guilty hote, tumi deserve koro na feel guilty hote being hurt er jonno. Tumi need koro care korte tomar thing.
Ami need kori stop being so selfish, ami need kori stop being so selfish, ami need kori take care of them.
Jodi ami take care na kori tader, tara upset hoye jay?
Tai tara sobsomoy rag kore tomake karon tumi tader care koro na selfish.
Eta ki tumake feel kore dey nijer ke bolle je tumi sad? Eta amake sad kore, eta amake hurt kore.
Tara bolle ami selfish. Jokhon tumi bolle ami care kori na jinish niye je ami kori. Ami try kori.
Keno tumi amake guilty feel korte dey?
Ami need kori needs thake, need kori taken care hote, jano tumi care koro na. Selfish hote dey na ami feel good. Eta kemon feel hote dey jokhon tumi shono je hurt, pain. Just step it up chai.
Jokhon tumi nijer ke bolcho je ami hurt, nijer ke selfish, eta kemon feel kore?
Eta just really confusing. Ami need kori break out korte ei guilty feeling theke ar just allow myself hurt korte. Ami deserve kori hurt. Ami deserve kori amar needs met hote, ami deserve kori.
Tai kemon feel kore tumake other self understands?

Eta still hurting kintu eta okay. Ami feel kori ami better je ami allowed to feel bad. Ami feel kori validated to help me. Ami need kori help amar family. Ami need kori hurt show korte tader je ami hurting kintu not feel guilty je ami seta korte pari. Hold on. Ami need kori eta inside. Feeling things feel lighter like eta not even.
Tai really, eta just feels more jokhon tumi shono je eta okay. Ami need kori validated. Nijeke bolcho kivabe feel hurt korte pari without feeling guilty.
About hurting, hurting. Eta need kore na selfish hote amar jonno.
Tai ekhon tumi agreement e ashte paro nijer sathe to allow that space.
Amra actually ajke time shesh korechi.
Tai ki koro? Eta niye jao ei saptah e.
Dhonnobad, sure.
